General.Name: Jinan High tech Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Jinan High-tech Development Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the investment, development, and operation of industrial parks and real estate in China. The company engages in the exploration, mining, and processing of precious metals and non-ferrous metals such as copper, lead, and zinc, as well as gold and others. In addition, it is involved in department store sales; property management; metal business; development of mining technology; engineering and construction of gardens; equity investment; construction project and quality inspection; agricultural machinery and equipment and car leasing; investment; business management consulting; and real estate consulting and leasing business. Further, the company engages in the sale of afforestation seedlings, seedlings, and economic forests, as well as building materials and cables; greening, landscaping, municipal, and building decoration engineering; and garden design and maintenance. Additionally, it provides technical development, consultation, and services for mining of mineral products; park management services; hotel management and accommodation services; investment consulting and management; and labor services. Jinan High-tech Development Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Jinan, China.
General.Address: Main office building, Longaotian Street, Jinan, China, 250101
